channel.title: Help plz!
channel.description: i cannot equip anything, and i feel like no1 is looking at my other topic so i will ask: What method is it to replace equipped items? i cannot equip anything so please help me!

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

im using allstar-scape v2 317 server no client juss silabs bump…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2009, 10:03:19 am[/size][hr]some more helpful information is that when i added summoning(may also be the prob), the case 185 for summoning i replaced it and then couldn’t use specials so i added a specials handler and now i cant equip anything at all, plz help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2009, 07:39:41 pm[/size][hr]I WOULD JUST LIKE TO SAY UK U ALL WHO DIDN’T HELP ME! I FOUND IT FINALLY CASE 41; : ) I THINK I SHOULD GET ++1 REP LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Hero317 Hero317
item.description:
@Hero317 wrote:

so you want items to be equiped into a character? have you also got your base lines were u can equip stuff or can u not equiped it all from the start? if so, if your on espeon 508, go into the ‘equipment.java’ and ull see something like this,

	private String[] capes = {"Diving apparatus", "Bonesack", "cloak", "Cape", "cape", "Ava's"};
	private String[] hats = {"mitre", "Bunny ears", "Coif", "coif", "sallet", "Helm", "helm", "Hat", "hat", "Mask", "mask", "Hood", "hood"};
	private String[] boots = {"Boots","boots"};
	private String[] gloves = {"Gloves", "gloves", "Gauntlents", "Flames gloves", "gauntlets", "Vamb", "vamb", "Brace", "brace"};
	private String[] shields = {"satchel", "Saradomin kite", "Shield", "shield", "Book", "book", "Defender", "defender", "Spirit shield", "Blessed Spirit shield", "Toktz-ket-xil"};
	private String[] amulets = {"Highwayman mask", "stole", "Amulet", "amulet", "Necklace", "necklace"};
	private String[] arrows = {"Arrow", "arrow", "Bolt", "bolt"};
	private String[] rings = {"Ring", "ring"};
	private String[] body = {"Rock-shell plate", "Saradomin plate", "Varrock armour", "hauberk", "Guthix dragonhide", "Saradomin d'hide", "Zamorak d'hide", "Body", "body", "Shirt", "shirt", "Torso", "torso", "Top", "top", "Brassard", "brassard", "Chestplate", "chestplate"};
	private String[] legs = {"uniform", "Prison uniform trousers", "3rd age robe", "cuisse", "Legs", "legs", "Skirt", "skirt", "Bottom", "bottom", "Tasset", "tasset", "Chaps", "chaps", "Void knight robe"};
	private String[] weapons = {"Inferno Adze", "knife", "dart", "warhammer", "Basket of eggs", "Rubber chicken", "Statius's warhammer", "staff", "Undead chicken", "crozier", "Vesta's longsword", "Mouse toy", "claws", "Scythe", "Spear", "spear", "Meat tenderiser", "Blade", "blade", "Sword", "sword", "Scimitar", "scimitar", "Whip", "whip", "Mace", "mace", "Axe", "axe", "Dagger", "dagger", "Flail", "flail", "Bow", "bow", "Staff", "staff", "Wand", "wand", "Maul", "maul", "Halberd", "halberd", "Anchor", "anchor", "Tzhaar-ket-om", "Hammer", "hammer"};
	private String[] fullbody = {"Spined body", "Rock-shell plate", "Saradomin plate",  "Varrock armour", "Granite body", "hauberk", "Guthix d'hide", "Saradomin d'hide", "Zamorak d'hide", "Top", "top","Shirt", "shirt", "Platebody", "platebody", "Brassard", "brassard", "Chestplate", "chestplate", "Torso", "torso", "Dragon chainbody"};
	private String[] fullhat = {"Splitbark helm", "Hard hat", "Lumberjack hat", "Dwarven helmet", "Runner hat", "Fighter hat", "Ranger hat", "Healer hat", "3rd age mage hat", "mitre", "coif", "Coif", "Void melee helm", "Void ranger helm", "Void mage helm", "Archer helm", "Berserker helm", "Warrior helm", "Farseer helm", "med helm", "Dharok's helm", "Dharoks helm", "Hood", "hood", "Coif", "coif", "Helm of neitiznot"};
	private String[] fullmask = {"Lunar helm", "Adam full helm(g)", "Adam full helm(t)", "Black full helm(g)", "Black full helm(t)", "Rune full helm(g)", "Rune full helm (t)", "Zamorak full helm", "Tyras helm", "Slayer helmet", "Karil's coif", "sallet", "full helm", "Verac's helm", "Veracs helm", "Guthan's helm", "Guthans helm", "Torag's helm", "Torags helm", "Karil's coif", "Karils coif", "h'ween mask"};

just add eather full words or keywords between the " " 's followed by coma’s, you shuold then be able to make items requiptable IF you already have the equipped items set up, but i could be wrong, the way hes explaining it is the way that i think this problem shuold be fixed above, if wrong PLEAse correct me, thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“okya, post:2, topic:302789”]maybe cause we dont kno wtf you r talking bout.[/quote]No, maybe you just don’t understand, I know exactly what he is talking about.

If you used a “special handler” tutorial and now no items equip then go back and find the problem on what you added, if you’re lucky you will make it out with the special handler and item equipping, if you’re not lucky you’ll just make it out with item equipping or special handler, your choice, think hard, the choice depends on YOU.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

slick:

ok heres wut happended, i used a special handler tut http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-317-making-special-attack-269808/ and now i cannot equip anything

Please for the love of god stop making static classes and adding a call to that method in your “process()” method, you are solving nothing.
